diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AN$ is $10$.
The length of the line $BC$ is $30$.
The length of the line $CN$ is $5$.
The line $AC$ is perpendicular to the line $CN$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, and $BC$, forming triangle $ABC$.
There are lines $AN$, $BN$, and $CN$, forming triangle $BNC$.
